entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
